PARAM.DESC: address space qualifiers treated as hints
address space qualifiers treated as requirement
address space qualifiers are not permitted

OPTION.NAME: --checksum=
OPTION.DESC: Calculate a checksum and store the result in program memory

PARAM.DESC: Faulty table reads at -40 degrees C
GOTO instruction at reset vector must be preceded by NOP
DAW instruction may improperly clear CARRY bit
Read EEDAT immediately after setting RD bit
Don't set RD immediately after loading EEADR
Internal VRef must be enabled to write EEPROM
Internal VRef must be enabled to write flash
Specifically disable interrupt sources during tblwt instruction
Writes to flash must target opposite side of 4000h boundary
Data in RAM location can be corrupted if async. reset occurs during write

OPTION.NAME: --fill=
OPTION.DESC: Specify a ROM-fill value for unused memory

PARAM.DESC: Optimize asm code generated from C
Favor code generation for speed over space
Favor code generation for space over speed
Do not link in default startup module
Compile a program that will be installed via a bootloader
Program the device with default config words
Summary information is put into a file as well as on screen
